sentences.en: a middle-aged man with a florid complexion
sentences.cn: 一名脸色红润的中年男子

sentences.en: Come on together! Brandish the florid youth together!
sentences.cn: 一起舞动绚丽的青春吧!

sentences.en: Description: This is a still life painting depicts some florid flowers.
sentences.cn: 描述: 这幅画描述描述一瓶绚丽的花朵的静物画.

sentences.en: He is pretty well advanced in years, but hale , robust, and florid ( Tobias Smollett ).
sentences.cn: 他年纪虽相当大了但仍很健壮 、 结实且脸色红润 ( 托比亚斯斯摩莱特 ).

sentences.en: He said in a suddenly florid tone - it is the realization of a dream.
sentences.cn: 他突然用卖弄的口气说 -- 这是我们梦想的实现.

sentences.en: He was a good - looking man in a kind of coarse, florid way, aged about fifty.
sentences.cn: 他是那种粗糙的好看, 面色红润健康的人, 年龄大约在五十岁左右.

sentences.en: He was a large, cheerful man, with a florid complexion.
sentences.cn: 他块头很大, 性情愉快, 肤色红润.

sentences.en: He was violent and florid, as district - attorneys usually are.
sentences.cn: 他和平时其他的检察官一样,说得慷慨激昂, 才华横逸.

sentences.en: It is colorful and florid, is a new type of roofing material.
sentences.cn: 这是丰富多彩的和华丽, 是一种新型的屋面材料.

sentences.en: Jacobs was a stout, florid man.
sentences.cn: 雅各布斯身材结实，脸色红润。

sentences.en: Mr. Hubbard was a florid, red - whiskered little man.
sentences.cn: 赫巴德先生是个矮个子,面色红润, 蓄着红色的络腮胡子.

sentences.en: Tears were flowing over his florid face.
sentences.cn: 他通红的脸上淌着眼泪.

sentences.en: The bartender had a florid face and a receding hairline.
sentences.cn: 酒吧男招待面色红润，前额有点脱发。

sentences.en: The florid introduction was wasted on the governor.
sentences.cn: 这样吹捧的介绍,对总督来说,是白白浪费.

sentences.en: The senator gave a florid speech.
sentences.cn: 议员作了一番词藻华美的演说.

sentences.en: Years of heavy drinking had given Alison a florid complexion.
sentences.cn: 长期酗酒使艾莉森面色绯红.

trans.tran_cn: 红润的，华丽的，炫耀的，绚丽
trans.tran_en: a florid face is red in colour
